entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature rising to 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain changing to rain this evening. Fog patches developing early this evening. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h after midnight. Temperature rising to 9 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 14.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with a few showers beginning in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High 14. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
